concept.title: Add a GraphQL request to a test case

conbody.p:
You can add a GraphQL request into a test case. Katalon Studio generates a script that has send request method with a map of variables. Below is a sample test script generated:res = WS.sendRequest(findTestObject('Country/CountryQueryVarsInVars', [('id') : 'US']))
println CustomKeywords.'util.JSON.jsonBeautify'( res.getResponseBodyContent());
Save and run your test case. You can view the result of sending the request in the Log Viewer tab.log viewer tab
